data.name: Without Within 3 - Digital soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Soundtrack for Without Within 3. After purchasing and downloading the soundtrack, players will be able to listen to the tracks using Steam's music player.

Composer: Jeff Lawhead
WOWI 1 and 2 composer: Efe Tozan

Tracks list:
01. Without Within 3 theme
02. Comedy
03. Adventure
04. The Prodigy
05. There's Feeling in These Potatoes! (Welcome to Singapore)
06. On the Streets
07. A Velveteen Season is Calling (Streets of Singapore)
08. The Sights Won't See Themselves! (Sightseeing)
09. An Uncommon Era (Mystery)
10. What The F... Hey! (Ghost of Kiki)
11. Dalai Guanxi (Chinatown)
12. Immersive Calligraphy (Tai's theme)
13. Adventures Across The Sea (Welcome to Malaysia)
14. Hotel
15. Truth, Voice, and Ivory (Kiki's theme)
16. Morning
17. Chaos
18. I Don't Miss That Hairstyle (Date)
19. Touching
20. The Shape of Understanding (Death)
21. A Liberated Destiny Finally Earned (Ending)

Thank you for supporting Without Within 3!
